DOC.brief_summary: Administration antioxidant trauma patient improve measure oxidant stress blood
DOC.criteria: Adult non pregnant non lactate trauma patient GCS < 6 Renal dysfunction ( cre > 2.5 mg/dl ) Hepatic dysfunction ( TBili > 3.0 mg/dl ) Expected survival < 48 hour Burns > 20 % body surface area Immunedeficiency syndromes Steroid use
